channel.title: Promo
channel.description:
Well, Some people wanted me to get some stickers printed for promo.
This is basically just a sample of some random promo stickers, For giving out at events (Concerts, gigs, youth events) And stuff, to get in contact with a few bands and music promo companies. So far I have had interest from 1 record label, and 2 bands. I will give you more information when I can be bothered :D
Anyway, here's one of the designs.
[IMG]http://i17.tinypic.com/5xxzm77.png[/img]
I will also make flyers and posters.
Edit: I MADE MOST OF THE BRUSHES

item.title: Promo
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

Mr.Chris:

You’re just jealous Kaza. I don’t see any reason why he can’t use anyones brushes.

Why would i be jealous? Because anyone could do what he has done…And if i wanted, i could start making crappy stickers…

Read full topic

item.title: Promo
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Mr.Chris:

You’re just jealous Kaza. I don’t see any reason why he can’t use anyones brushes.

He can use them… He just should give some credits before he just goes and sells them…

Its like I took one of your PSDs stole most of the sig added a bit of stuff… And then sold it for $20 bucks without giving you no credits…

Read full topic

item.title: Promo
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:

You’re just jealous Kaza. I don’t see any reason why he can’t use anyones brushes.

item.title: Promo
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

My point, people spend ages to make these brushes and letting them out free, then JV is just putting them together and making money from it.

Read full topic

item.title: Promo
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:6, topic:95003”]Kaza, using someones brushes is hardly taking their hard work.

Nice stickers, but print costs would be pretty high?[/quote]

Actually it is… Many people spend days making a set of brushes…
There giving it to you for free… And then you sell it?..

Read full topic

item.title: Promo
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

[quote=“Kaza, post:4, topic:95003”][quote author=uber one link=topic=137431.msg1327645#msg1327645 date=1179354008]
Kaza stop flaming him…

Good job look’s really nice, Don’t worry about kaza I think he’s cranky t’day.
[/quote]

People these days can’t stand to hear the truth, it is CC, CC = Constructive critism, and i never said, “nah m8 shit as fuck innit mush innit brapppp!?!?1/” i said i like it, although it is nothing special.[/quote]

This is exactly what I need.

Thanks both of you.

kaza, I did actually make a large majority of the brushes myself. So yeah

Read full topic

item.title: Promo
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

Nice look, although they are only brushes, so it isn’t anything special, if you pen tooled all the vector shapes it would make it alot better tbh, because somone else made the brushes, and really your just selling other peoples hard work.

Just a bit off patterning, erasing, brushing and text, nothing special on how you made.

Read full topic
